author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Shiv Sena, on Monday, used the row around the arrest and subsequent release of JNUSU president Kanhaiya Kumar to take a dig at the BJP.

An editorial in Sena mouthpiece Saamna said: “Despite so much noise over the JNU issue, this man comes out of jail in 10-15 days and beats the govt. at its own game. How did it happen?”

Attacking BJP activists who had labelled the students as anti-national or anti-government and those who had allegedly announced cash rewards to anyone who would cut off Mr. Kumar’s tongue, the Sena said that they were the reason why he had become a hero.
title: Sena lashes out at BJP
